Uses of Package
rekit.logic.gameelements.particles

  • Packages that use rekit.logic.gameelements.particles 
    Package Description
    rekit.logic.gameelements.entities.enemies.cannon  
    rekit.logic.gameelements.particles  
  • Classes in rekit.logic.gameelements.particles used by rekit.logic.gameelements.entities.enemies.cannon 
    Class and Description
    DamageParticle
    Regular Particle with the only difference, that it damages the Player upon collision.
    Particle
    A simple GameElement with no collision and only with graphical effects.
    ParticleSpawnerOption
    Represents an option for a ProgressDependency.
  • Classes in rekit.logic.gameelements.particles used by rekit.logic.gameelements.particles 
    Class and Description
    DamageParticle
    Regular Particle with the only difference, that it damages the Player upon collision.
    Particle
    A simple GameElement with no collision and only with graphical effects.
    ParticleSpawner
    This class will be used to manage the spawning of particles.
    You have to set the parameters of the particles by the public Fields of your ParticleSpawner Object
    ParticleSpawnerOption
    Represents an option for a ProgressDependency.
    TextParticle
    Particle that shows a text, that can be specified via TextParticle.setText(String)
